response.overview: Another family dinner at the McGuy residence, and another feast of fast-paced conversation and free-flowing wine. But the McGuys are not alone in the house. An outsider lurks upstairs, and when he crashes into the party a shocking series of events lead to a dead body lying on the floor. What happens next reveals some deeply-held secrets and and forces this all-American family to question everything they've always believed about themselves.
response.title: Heavy Objects
